about.title: About Me
about.heading: [1] ABOUT
about.intro: I'm a Business Informatics student specializing in Data Engineering and AI. My passion lies in building scalable data infrastructure and intelligent systems that drive business value.
about.journeyText: Started my journey in 2024, diving deep into data engineering fundamentals. Completed multiple certifications and bootcamps while building real-world projects.
about.focusText: Working on AI-powered analytics tools, RAG systems, and cloud-native data pipelines. Exploring the intersection of data engineering and machine learning.
about.beyondText: When I'm not engineering data pipelines, you'll find me exploring new tech stacks, contributing to open source, or documenting my learning journey.

projects.title: Featured Projects
projects.heading: [2] PROJECTS

skills.title: Technical Stack
skills.heading: [3] SKILLS
skills.certSubtitle: During my studies, I've also gained some experience through certifications & online courses.
